titleInfo.title: ‘Sketch in Outline of the Isthmus at Aden showing the manner in which the Special Committee propose to defend the Flanks of their Position’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:756 x 1056 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Outline plan compiled by a Special Committee on the Aden Defences formed of Engineers William Jacob and C.W. Grant, Bombay 15 July 1843.Shows the proposed site of military camp in Aden with fortifications and position of guns of batteries, barracks and water supply reservoirs with pipes. Annotations on topographical features also included.Inscriptions:Bottom left-hand corner: ‘Copied in the Chief Engineers OfficeBombay 4 August 1843’Bottom right-hand corner: ‘Revd. by J.M.G.’.
